snippet: The 86.7 percent drop in sales for "MDNA" is a symptom of music's new promotional rhythm, which is coming to resemble the movie business, with an obsession on winning the opening weekend.
abstract: The 86.7 percent drop in sales for "MDNA" is a symptom of music's new promotional rhythm, which is coming to resemble the movie business, with an obsession on winning the opening weekend.

headline.main: Madonna's Sprint to No. 1 Has Made the Fall Even Harder
